tool_name: GMT Timestamp and Date Information API
tool_description: This is a simple Flask API that returns the current timestamp and date information based on GMT offset.
title: GMT Timestamp and Date Information API

api_list.name: date_info
api_list.description: /date_info/"gmt_offset": Returns the current date information, including the timestamp, month, year, day, weekday, week, hour, minute, second, and number of days in the month, based on the specified GMT offset (in hours).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gmt-timestamp-and-date-information-api.p.rapidapi.com/date_info/0"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gmt-timestamp-and-date-information-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: timestamp
api_list.description: /timestamp/"gmt_offset": Returns the current timestamp based on the specified GMT offset (in hours).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gmt-timestamp-and-date-information-api.p.rapidapi.com/timestamp/0"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gmt-timestamp-and-date-information-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
